snippet: Former players who hired lawyers to sue the league are upset that the settlement could provide payments to players who did not file lawsuits and would not have to pay legal fees.
abstract: Former NFL players who hired lawyers to sue the league over concealing dangers of concussions are upset that the proposed settlement could provide payments to players who did not file lawsuits and would not have to pay legal fees.
lead_paragraph: Former players who hired lawyers to sue the league are upset that the settlement could provide payments to players who did not file lawsuits and would not have to pay legal fees.

headline.main: With N.F.L. Concussion Deal, Two Tiers of Payouts
headline.print_headline: Concussion Deal: 2 Tiers of Payouts, and 2 Levels of Responsibility
